name: Linehot Putin: All Stars (Путин против Инопланетян)
name_original: Linehot Putin: All Stars (Путин против Инопланетян)
description:
The game - staged in 5 actions "Linehot Putin: All Stars"

Vladimir Vladimirovich fulfills his presidential duties, when suddenly, at an extremely inopportune moment, President Donald calls him and informs that aliens attacked him! Putn!n could have thought that Donald had gone cuckoo, but more recently aliens attacked Vladimir Vladimirovich. Therefore, having forgotten all the insults and sanctions, Putn goes to the White House, wanting to put an end to the aliens' obscurantism! However, not all so simple..

Roles are performed by:
President of Russia - Linehot Put!n


President of the United States - just Donald


Alien Sow - Frao Madam


Put!n's friend and part-time "father" - Chesnochenko


Cameo Pravdorub - Navalny


Local addict on the area - Hedgehog in the fog


Closer to the premiere of the list of characters will be updated.
This game is fiction and is the imagination of the author, and the characters have no real prototypes.

This is what those few lucky people who have already managed to see the play write:
"Having played this game, I realized that I want the same tough president!" - Native Zimbabwean Adalbert the Third.
"Dramaturgy rolls over. This is the benefit of Putin's Linehot!" - Uncle Sanya Dramatist.
... and this is not a complete list of rave reviews!

I would also like to note that the previous series of performances by the extremely authoritative information and entertainment portal Kanoby was rated at 10/10 points. Also, the game was highlighted by the St. Petersburg TV channel Tv5 in the evening news.
